caption:
This photograph captures a woman with striking face paint, reminiscent of a mime or clown, standing in an outdoor setting. The makeup includes white face paint with dramatic black accents around the eyes and eyebrows, and a red circular mark on each cheek. She also wears red lipstick. Her hair is long, flows freely, and appears slightly windswept. She is dressed in a sleeveless, collared, checkered shirt that is knotted at the waist.

The background features a prominent fountain, which is actively spraying water, creating a dynamic and refreshing backdrop. There is lush greenery around and it appears to be a sunny day, as indicated by the brightness and shadows present in the scene. Visible in the farther background are a few indistinct figures, one of whom seems to be riding a bicycle, suggesting this scene might be set in a park or a similarly recreational public space. The overall atmosphere is lively and the setting implies a place designed for leisure and enjoyment.
title: Girl made up for a sorority initiation crosses Fountain Square.
